name: TrueWay Matrix
description: Calculate distances and durations between a set of origins and destinations.

api_methods.name: CalculateDrivingDistanceMatrix
api_methods.description: Calculate distances and durations between a set of origins and destinations.

parameters.name: origins
parameters.description: List of origins described as semicolon-delimited coordinate pairs with latitudes and longitudes. Max: 25

parameters.name: destinations
parameters.description: List of destinations described as semicolon-delimited coordinate pairs with latitudes and longitudes. If not specified, an n x n matrix will be generated using the origins. Max: 25

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Time when travel is expected to start. You can specify the time as an integer in seconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC or you can use \"now\" to specify the current time.

constraints.format: seconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC or 'now'
